column1: #: description: The ratio of the $\mathrm{T_{AA}}$-scaled prompt $\Lambda^+_c$ yields to prompt $\mathrm{D_0}$ versus $p_{\mathrm{T}}$ from PbPb collisions for 0-90 and 0-10% centrality classes. The global normalization uncertainty is 7.3%.
